A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Where's the Jedi training scene?! You had one job...

Also none of the characters make any intelligent or rational decisions. It's as if everyone is making decisions with their feelings\, and the narrative somehow conspires to glorify this?

Also\, the lightsaber fights are incredibly sub-par\, possibly related to the fact that there's no JEDI TRAINING SCENE.
